text: High Wall is a 1947 American crime drama movie directed by Curtis Bernhardt and was based on the play by Alan R. Clark and Bradbury Foote. It stars Robert Taylor, Audrey Totter, Herbert Marshall, Dorothy Patrick, Warner Anderson, Jonathan Hale, Morris Ankrum and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Curtis Bernhardt
title: High Wall
